item.description:
WORLD PASSIONS
October 22-November 1, 2009

“Stellar”— Boston Phoenix on Paquita excerpt, Night of Stars.


Tickets start at $25.00.

Paquita BOSTON BALLET PREMIERE
Music: Ludwig Minkus Choreography: Pino Alosa after Marius Petipa
World Premiere Choreography: â€ˆ Helen Pickett
Rhyme Music: Frederic Chopin • Choreography: Viktor Plotnikov
Carmen/Illusions Music: Rodion Shchedrin • Choreography: Jorma Elo

An evening of variety and innovation by four international choreographers, World Passions will please audiences with its contrasts and display the versatility of the company.

Official Site: http://www.bostonball...

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Boston Ballet's World Passions: “Stellar”— Boston Phoenix
